Select B.NO, A.GRPNAME, A.GRPCD, B.BASNAME, B.BASECD, B.REMARK, B.ISDELETE, B.BASEVAL From PGRPBASCD A Inner Join PBASCD B On A.GRPCD = B.GRPCD
Where A.GRPCD =#grpCd#
Select A.GRPCD,B.BASEKEY, B.BASECD, B.BASEVAL From PGRPBASCD A Inner Join PBASCD B On A.GRPCD = B.GRPCD Where A.ISDELETE ='N'

SELECT sql_calc_found_rows NLDNO,SIDO, GUGUN, DORONAME, BLDMAIN, BLDSUBMAIN, BUPNAME,HDONGNAME, JIMAIN, JISUBMAIN FROM PADDRESS
WHERE BUPNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#bupname#,'%')
AND JIMAIN LIKE CONCAT('%',#jimain#,'%')
ORDER BY BUPNAME, JIMAIN, JISUBMAIN LIMIT #startRow#,#endRow#

SELECT sql_calc_found_rows NLDNO,SIDO, GUGUN, DORONAME, BLDMAIN, BLDSUBMAIN, BUPNAME,HDONGNAME, JIMAIN, JISUBMAIN FROM PADDRESS WHERE DORONAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#doroname#,'%') ORDER BY DORONAME, BLDMAIN, BLDSUBMAIN LIMIT #startRow#,#endRow#
